logic: When processing an Account Opening request (bizCode='001'), the system must validate the provided 'idNo' against the existing Account Repository (initialized via T-1 Setup Data/accounts.json). If the 'idNo' already exists, the system must reject the registration, return the existing 'accountId', set the confirmation status to '0' (Failure), and assign the error code 'ID_EXISTS'.
condition: Request bizCode is '001' AND 'idNo' matches an existing record in dataRepo.findByIdNo(idNo)
